column4: Outer loop Man O War Blvd near Winthrop Dr
Tates Creek Rd at Rockbridge Rd
A Winter Weather Advisory is in effect until 8 a.m.
Use added caution due to possible black ice, especially on bridges and overpasses.
Slow down and increase following distances.
New signals have been installed on Man O War Blvd at I-75S.
Signals currently in flash mode.  Activation scheduled for Tuesday 11/12 at approximately 10 a.m.
